attributes.action: publicly acknowledge that he is temperamentally unsuited to hold any form of public office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the last 24 hours I have heard two different Nu-Labour members describe Gordon Brown as 'totally focussed' only on what he can say to deride the opposition and that he is 'vicious' in his attitude towards doing down anybody who does not TOTALLY agree with him.  These are NOT the qualities we want in somebody who is supposed to be in charge of this country.  He is a danger to all of us in his current mental state and he has to be removed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
